name: Boca Code Candidates Page Before
about: In Boca Code's Previous candidates page, picures were too small, and had excess white space and overall needed a revamp.

name: Boca Code Candidate Page Before
about: In the previous Candidate page, student information was lacking and user's weren't really able to learn much about a student through a simple paragraph.

name: Boca Code Candidates Page After
about: To address the previous issues, we created student cards with their final project image as a background to show off student's unique styles, and made each student card and image larger to fill in some of the unnecessary white space.

name: Boca Code Candidate Page After
about: We added each studen't final project as well as a Q&A to learn much about each student'sunique strengths and skills as well as adding more color and styling changes to add more energy and passion to the page.
